content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5).

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-23.5, y=-69.5).
- Transport Belt network connecting various positions, including (x=-24.5, y=-69.5), (x=-21.5, y=-69.5), and (x=-21.5, y=-66.5).

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-54.5) transferring items to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-12.5, y=-54.5).

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) with a Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) storing produced iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5) transferring items between chests.

### Iron Plate Storage at Position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5) storing iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-17.5, y=-64.5) transferring items from a Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0).

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserters have a continuous supply of source items to prevent them from idling. Check the supply chain feeding into the inserters to ensure they are receiving the necessary items.

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
